page.title: 12LEISURE TIME: ACTON & L'HAM
page.content: There are sports grounds for cricket tennis and football in this part of Lavenham. Wallking, bird watching and shooting are available. The block forms a corridor between two tourist villages and good hotels and restaurants are at hand. Eating out with family and friends is a favoured leisure activity. Theatre Clubs are based in Acton and Lavenham. Concerts of good standard take place in Lavenham. Membership of the Women's Institute, National Farmers Union and Young Farmers Clubs offer social activities. A varied adult edu- cation programme in nearby Sudbury caters for a wide range of interests. Church and Charity activities offer relaxation. Car ownership widens the leisure possibilities for most households.
